tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE secure_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensitive_data VARCHAR(255) ENCRYPTED,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_encryption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(255),
    encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_transmission (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_name VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_name VARCHAR(50),
    encrypted_data VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transmission_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transmission_time TIMESTAMP,
    transmission_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
